price: Wasiweze kuwasikiliza viumbe watukufu. Na wanafukuzwa huko kila upande.
arabic: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ وَيُقۡذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٖ
footnotes: Hao majabari wa kishetani hawawezi kusikiliza yanayo pita katika ulimwengu wa Malaika. Na wao hupopolewa kwa kila kinacho faa cha kuwazuia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā yassammaʿūna ilā al-mala-i al-aʿlā wayuq'dhafūna min kulli jānibin
